Job Posting:171046 - Position: F25 Automation Test Developer Co-op 171046B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 07/04/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 06/27/2025 03:14 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Flutter International Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Fall F25 Automation Test Developer Co-op 171046B Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job title: Automation test developer co-op Location: Toronto Are you our next Rising Star? You're studying hard and it's time to start your next adventure. You have big ideas and you want to voice them. And you want to become part of a company that gives you everything you need to create winning moments for yourself and millions of players around the world. Welcome to Flutter International. So, who are we? We're home to some of the biggest, most exciting brands in the online gaming industry, with offices, events and players all over the world. We're the ultimate owner of such brands as PokerStars, PokerStars Casino, Sky Bet, Betfair International, and Fanduel as well as live poker tour and event brands. This role follows a hybrid approach to working, allowing you to combine working from home with working in our modern offices. These discussions are between you and your manager to find the best pattern for you both, while recognising that quality time together is essential for keeping us mission-aligned. Your seat is open. What you'll be doing • Developing and maintaining automation tests. • Executing automated regression tests on a regular basis. • Analyzing automated test failures and escalate to respective development teams. • Debugging and investigating software failures. • Identifying root cause of automated test failures. • Gathering testing requirements from QA analysts and product owners. • Working closely with QA analysts and software developers. • Attending daily stand-up meetings and be responsible for communicating all issues, status and progress Performing multiple tasks at the same time • What do we need from you? Essential • 2+ year on the Computer Science Bachelor • Java Experience. • Excellent organizational and time management skills • Knowledge of SQL. • Task driven with a great attitude and excellent communication/interpersonal skills. • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, initiative and innovative thinking. Ability to work multiple tasks at the same time. • Desirable • Knowledge of testing methodologies. • Experience with Source Version Control Systems (Git) • Experience with JIRA Experience with test automation tools • The Process We'll aim to get back to you within 14 days of applying. After that, you'll be invited to complete a video interview. If successful, you'll then be invited to an interview. We'll take your summer plans into consideration when organising a start date but ideally we'd like the successful candidate to start at the beginning of September 2025 for 4 months. Perks and Benefits The salary for this job is competitive for the co-op market, so whilst we are not able to go into detail at this stage, we can say that we offer great salary packages. Equal opportunities: At Flutter International we are committed to creating an inclusive environment where our people can be their authentic selves and thrive. We embrace and celebrate diversity, respecting all our uniqueness and differences. We welcome you to let us know whether you have any accessibility needs. All you need to do is email us at talent@flutterint.com . Your journey with us is focused on ensuring you have what you need to be your best self. Learn more about the works we are doing on Inclusion and Belonging here: https://careers.flutterinternational.com/working-at- flutter-international/diversity-equity-inclusion/ The group: Flutter International is a proud member of the Flutter Entertainment family, a global leader in sports betting, iGaming, and entertainment. We're not just another company; we're listed on both the prestigious FTSE 100 index on the London Stock Exchange and the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE). What sets us apart is our world class brands, cutting-edge products, and our International division includes our operations in over 100 global markets and offers sports betting, casino, poker, rummy and lottery, mainly online. What truly defines us is our commitment to ensuring that the excitement of gaming and entertainment is experienced in a responsible and sustainable way. Our remarkable team of over 8,000 colleagues drives this vision, spread across 28 offices worldwide. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
